article_title: A Campaign Promise Could Be In Sight

article_metadata.description: BY CHRISTINE HARBIN - American patients, taxpayers and job creators need relief from the healthcare law right now--they simply can't afford another act in Washington political theater.
article_metadata.author: Capital Flows
